Package org.apache.commons.lang.mutable

Class MutableInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • org.apache.commons.lang.mutable.MutableInt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable, Mutable
    @Deprecated(since="2021-04-30")
public class MutableInt
extends Number
implements Comparable, Mutable
    Deprecated.
    Commons Lang 2 is in maintenance mode. Commons Lang 3 should be used instead.
    A mutable int wrapper.
    Since:
    2.1
    See Also:
    Integer, Serialized Form
